title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 146.4 - Acceptance of training grant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 146.4 - Acceptance of training grant

State Regulations
A grant for the training of public librarians shall be
deemed vacant unless an acceptance thereof is filed with the department within
15 days of notification to the person entitled thereto. Except when a leave of
absence has been granted as provided in the following section, the recipient of
the training grant award must enter upon at least half-time work in an approved
library school in this State at the beginning of the semester immediately
succeeding the award of the training grant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
146.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
